name: Cohorts revenue evolution
description: Observing cohort revenue per user using months of acquisition gives information about the evolution of users' behavior. This test should be customized by setting the observed cohorts. The default selected cohorts are October, November and December 2020 (marked as 2020-10, 2020-11 and 2020-12).

blocks.description: It shows the overview of selected cohorts over following periods (the test should be customized to display optimal data)
